Description: One amulet, one bead. A: Fragment of an amulet, made of turquoise faience, showing the tail of a scorpion, the base is flat, the top is textured. Rest broken off. B: One disc-shaped bead made of turquoise faience.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), D14.9, room F
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
